characteristics.name: Problem Solving Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as a key aspect of their problem-solving approach.

options.description: Focused on breaking down complex problems into manageable parts.
Depends on instinct and experience to navigate challenging situations.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Clearly values direct and clear communication in their online interactions.

options.description: Uses straightforward language to convey ideas.
Often incorporates subtle hints and suggestions into their messages.

characteristics.name: Global Perspective
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a broad understanding of global issues and interconnectedness.

options.description: Takes a comprehensive view of complex problems and seeks to address them globally.
Prioritizes local concerns and initiatives over international ones.

characteristics.name: Collaboration Approach
characteristics.description: Fosters a sense of community and cooperation in their online endeavors.

options.description: Makes an effort to understand and appreciate diverse perspectives.
Emphasizes individual achievement over collective success.

characteristics.name: Technical Literacy
characteristics.description: Possesses a strong foundation in technical skills and stays up-to-date with industry advancements.

options.description: Mastery of multiple programming languages and technologies.
Familiarity with fundamental concepts and tools.

characteristics.name: Learning Habits
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a passion for ongoing learning and self-improvement.

options.description: Seeks out new knowledge and experiences with enthusiasm.
Considers themselves knowledgeable in their area of expertise.

characteristics.name: Relationship Priorities
characteristics.description: Values deep connections and meaningful relationships above other aspects of life.

options.description: Fosters close, personal bonds with others.
Prioritizes social connections and community engagement.

characteristics.name: Motivation Drive
characteristics.description: Is fueled by a strong sense of purpose and passion for their work.

options.description: Driven by personal fulfillment and satisfaction.
Motivated by external factors such as recognition or reward.
